characterDescription: Varnali was one of three members of the Parshendi ruling council - an elder - who desired and orchestrated the death of Gavilar Kholin, then king of Alethkar.

characterDetails.Appearance: He wore neatly stitched cloth wraps, sashes at the waist, loose shirts with no sleeves, hanging vests, open at the sides, woven in bright colors. Clothing wasn't segregated by gender.
